course.subject: CENG
course.name: Energy Initiative Forging Future Engineer Leaders
course.description: This course aims to develop a new knowledge-delivery approach to the engineering students. The course will involve two universities, The HKUST and Seoul National University (SNU), giving a study on various aspects and future prospective in the energy engineering sectors. Faculty members from both universities will deliver the essential contents on energy aspects. In which, the course will divide into two main parts including the future prospective of various kinds of energy technologies and the case studies of different countries. Success of this course will certainly bring a new type of the knowledge-transfer approach and provides opportunities to our students to interact with other overseas students.
